## Protected Member Functions

### equal&#95;to() {#a129ee5196cc4c1acc13f9e8345ea3e53}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual bool llvm::SMTExpr::equal&#95;to (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smtexpr">SMTExpr</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> &amp; other) const</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Query the SMT solver and returns true if two sorts are equal (same kind and bit width).

This does not check if the two sorts are the same objects.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/smtapi-h/#l00125">125</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/smtapi-h">SMTAPI.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
